Wheeljack-X::

"Yeah, there was," Jackie responds.  "Blown away in the Third 
Cybertronian War.  I do pretty much the same sort of things.  General 
surgeon and Mr. Fix-it, that's me.  A little bit on the loopy side, 
according to performance reviews."  He laughs.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "The first Wheeljack??"said confused Nightlight"so existed an 
autobot 
> named Wheeljack?"
